txt.en: Discover where the foes of the Rohirrim dwell in Wildermore.
Complete Blooming in the Snow deed

Gárwig gave each of his sons a section of the Fallows as they came of age. Each of them built or inherited a farm on their land, and some were more successful than others at producing goods for Forlaw and Wildermore.
Complete Loved and Lost deed
Discover all of Forlaw's interiors.
Explore the Wilds of Wildermore
Discover the peaks of the High Knolls.
Explore the Isolation in the Whitshaws
Even flowers and plants can be hardy enough to brave the fearsome snows. When you come upon these fierce little blooms, you feel hope for the shivering people of Wildermore.
Explore the Path of Núrzum
Explore the Settlements of Wildermore
Explore the Peaks of the High Knolls
Most of the Reeve's family are laid to rest in the graveyard outside of Forlaw. Most of his family has been killed recently as the conflict in Wildermore escalates.
Explore the wilds of Wildermore.
Explore the few remaining settlements of Wildermore, whose people cling for any shred of hope, while Núrzum and Saruman unleash their fury upon the land.
Explore These Hostile Lands
Some folk in the Whitshaws prefer isolation to the company of others.
Explore the Farms of the Fallows
Discover the sites of Núrzum's destruction in Wildermore.
Discover the settlements of the people of Wildermore.
Explore Forlaw
Explorer of Wildermore
